title: Rune Page Bugged On New Client.
body: Old Client will no longer be available, so I need to be able to adjust my Runes on the new client. I have reported the bug a couple times now and it's been around a month since the first report. I have seen no change and in that time I also have had Loot problems with getting nothing from opening chests. Whenever I change my pages and try to save; it says my runebook is corrupted. I have no problems on the Old Client and I would have no problem switching to the New Client if it wasn't at 75% functionality.

replies.body:
Those corrupted rune pages have been a little bothersome, but we can get it fixed pretty quickly if you hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). 

It looks like a couple of chests you opened gave you some Summoner profile icons, which don't actually go into your loot. The most recent one I'm seeing was about a month ago when you got the Super Galaxy Shyvana icon. Check you icons for that one if you didn't realize you got it!
I have submitted a ticket and forgot that you could even get icon's. Thanks for the help.
